amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prohibit the Department of Justice from interfering with state and tribal cannabis programs. The term state includes the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, the Virgin Islands, and Puerto Rico.
amendment.purpose: An prohibits the Department of Justice from interfering with state and tribal cannabis programs. The term state includes the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, the Virgin Islands, and Puerto Rico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A006) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 254 - 163 (Roll no. 174).
